articles.author: Chuck Mikolajczak
articles.title: S&P, Nasdaq futures at record levels as Trump signs stimulus aid bill - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. stocks rallied on Monday, with each of Wall Street's main indexes closing at record levels as President Donald Trump's signing of a long-awaited $2.3 trillion pandemic aid bill increased optimism for an economic recovery.
articles.content: NEW YORK (Reuters) -U.S. stocks rallied on Monday, with each of Wall Streets main indexes closing at record levels as President Donald Trumps signing of a long-awaited $2.3 trillion pandemic aid bill… [+3260 chars]
